-- -json { "permalink" : "boots_feed.xml", "eleventyExcludeFromCollections" : true, "metadata" : { "title": "Boots 2022", "subtitle": "My journey throught the rxb's boob", "url": "https://example.com/", "feedUrl": "https://lionelpinheiro/boots_feed.xml", "author": { "name": "Lionel Pinheiro", "email": "contact.pinheiro.lionel@gmail.com" } } } -- - { { metadata.title } } { { metadata.subtitle } } { { collections.posts | getNewestCollectionItemDate | dateToRfc3339 } } { { metadata.url } } { { metadata.author.name } } { { metadata.author.email } } { % -for post in collections.posts % } { % set absolutePostUrl % } { { post.url | url | absoluteUrl(metadata.url) } } { % endset % } { { post.data.title } } { { post.date | dateToRfc3339 } } { { absolutePostUrl } } { { post.templateContent | htmlToAbsoluteUrls(absolutePostUrl) } } { % -endfor % }
